headline: Kenvue Holders Weigh Risks As Kimberly-Clark Deal Clears Key Hurdle
summary: Kimberly-Clark and Kenvue shareholders have overwhelmingly approved the proposed acquisition of Kenvue. The vote clears a key procedural step toward combining the two businesses into a single health and wellness company. Integration planning is underway, with the deal still subject to regulatory approvals before closing. Kenvue (NYSE:KVUE), which most investors know for its consumer health brands, now sits at an important turning point after shareholders backed the Kimberly-Clark deal. The...
